titleStmt.title: The Book of Psalms in metre close and proper to the Hebrew, smooth and pleasant for the metre, plain and easie for the tunes : with musical notes, arguments, annotations, and index : fitted for the ready use and understanding of all good Christians.
titleStmt.author: Barton, William, 1598?-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons for the Companie of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by NUC pre-1956 imprints to Barton.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
